name: Shield Specialization
baseDescription: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 1% and increases the amount blocked by 5%.

name: Guardian Totems
baseDescription: Increases the amount of damage reduced by your Stoneskin Totem and Windwall Totem by 10% and reduces the cooldown of your Grounding Totem by 1 sec.

name: Thundering Strikes
baseDescription: Improves your chance to get a critical strike with all spells and attacks by 1%.

name: Improved Ghost Wolf
baseDescription: Reduces the cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by 1 sec.

name: Improved Lightning Shield
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by 5%.

name: Enhancing Totems
baseDescription: Increases the effect of your Strength of Earth and Grace of Air Totems by 8%.

name: Two-Handed Axes and Maces
baseDescription: Allows you to wield two-handed axes and two-handed maces.

name: Anticipation
baseDescription: Increases your chance to dodge by 1%.

name: Flurry
baseDescription: Increases your attack speed by 10% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.

name: Toughness
baseDescription: Increases your armor value from items by 2%.

name: Improved Weapon Totems
baseDescription: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Windfury Totem by 15%.

name: Elemental Weapons
baseDescription: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Rockbiter Weapon and Windfury Weapon by 13% and increases the damage caused by your Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon by 5%.

name: Parry
baseDescription: Gives a chance to parry enemy melee attacks.

name: Weapon Mastery
baseDescription: Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by 2%.

name: Stormstrike
baseDescription: Gives you an extra attack. In addition, the next 2 sources of Nature damage dealt to the target are increased by 20%.
